channel.title: Cross-platfrom on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Cross-platfrom on Machine Learning

item.title: Python GUI Frontend Options Comparison
item.description: Mainly for the (cross-platform) Python GUI frontend options. CEF (Chromium Embedded Framework). Pro: can use the same way of MVC thinking (modern html5); build-in chromium browser. Con: someone said it may need a little c++. PyQt (v5). Pro: big community, good doc (for c++). Con: c++ way of thinking, just the language is py (the official GUI tutorial lacks GUI screenshots!); pay for commercial usage; still often needs c++. Tkinter. Pro: build-in w/ py, big community.
